dc_title_s: Map of the mineral regions of the counties of Gogebic and Ontonagon, Michigan, 1887 / published by Edw. P. Allis & H.B. Merrell ; compiled by Mess. J.M. Longyear and J.M. Case, Marquette, Mich.
dc_description_s: Shows lands of Allis & Merrell in green, and of Case & Longyear in red. Also shows mines and mineral explorations, iron ranges, existing and projected railroads, wagon roads, and supply roads. Relief shown by hachures. "Supplement to the Mining, real estate & manufacturing reporter, Milwaukee, Wis., June 4th, 1887" --Upper margin. "Copyright applied for by Edw. P. Allis, Milwaukee, Wis." 1 map : color ; 50 x 62 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_publisher_sm: Milwaukee, Wis. : Edw. P. Allis & H.B. Merrell,
